name: RACING IN CAR TRAFFIC RACER 21
description:
RACING IN CAR TRAFFIC RACER 2021 - start your engines and step on the gas! Racing in car, high quality interiors, 3d beautifull graphic. Best car game simulator with more then 30 cars, from racing cars to off road SUVs, all kinds of exotic vehicles with their own unique car driving physics!
  
Drive as fast as you can overtaking every car you see in the volume of traffic with most exhilarating and fastest car in Highway Racer.   
Test your driver skills. Drive various cool cars, get mode you like and show us what you are able? It’s here best car simulator game, with best driving game experience  Now you can experience it for free!
Select your favorite car, upgrade,tuning, tune it and take a race.It is time to conquer endless highway traffic racer your cool, car.Driving car games 2022 & parking. Practice is the best school for driving, real driving feelings & physics.

Learn how to drive, play multiplayer, parking your car. Big endless open world. Best driving simulator of 2021

- Realistic POV view from the driver's seat
- Smart traffic system
- Car Tuning: make your acceleration quicker, speed higher, handling better and brakes faster!
- Day & Night time, turnings, bridges and tunnels
